alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Hardeman; Haywood; Lauderdale; Madison; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 12:50AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Tipton, northeastern Fayette, northwestern Hardeman, southeastern Lauderdale, Haywood and west central Madison Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1250 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Brownsville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brownsville, Whiteville, Hillville, Dancyville, Stanton, Asbury, Fayette Corners, Cedar Chapel, Cotton Lake, Hickory Point, Orysa, Sunnyhill, Taylor Chapel, Keeling, Morton Hill, Gift, Shepp, Tabernacle, Miller and Turnpike. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fayette; Hardeman; Haywood; Lauderdale; Madison; Tipton
